Bosses say they’re done being nice — which is hilarious, because when exactly did that start? In this video, we dig into CEOs canceling bonuses, cutting perks, blaming workers for layoffs, and demanding more for less. Wall Street Journal says “everyone’s replaceable,” Starbucks wants more hustle, and Uber’s idea of a reward is four weeks off after eight years. Welcome to corporate gaslighting, 2025 edition.
title: BREAKING NEWS: BOSSES ARE DONE BEING NICE!
